allow:
Bash(FILTER_BRANCH_SQUELCH_WARNING=1 git filter-branch -f --env-filter '
export GIT_AUTHOR_NAME=""leoeberts""
export GIT_COMMITTER_NAME=""leoeberts""
if [ ""$GIT_AUTHOR_DATE"" = ""2025-09-13 12:00:00 +0200"" ]; then
    export GIT_AUTHOR_DATE=""2024-09-13 12:00:00 +0200""
    export GIT_COMMITTER_DATE=""2024-09-13 12:00:00 +0200""
elif [ ""$GIT_AUTHOR_DATE"" = ""2025-09-14 12:00:00 +0200"" ]; then
    export GIT_AUTHOR_DATE=""2024-09-14 12:00:00 +0200""
    export GIT_COMMITTER_DATE=""2024-09-14 12:00:00 +0200""
elif [ ""$GIT_AUTHOR_DATE"" = ""2025-09-15 12:00:00 +0200"" ]; then
    export GIT_AUTHOR_DATE=""2024-09-15 12:00:00 +0200""
    export GIT_COMMITTER_DATE=""2024-09-15 12:00:00 +0200""
elif [ ""$GIT_AUTHOR_DATE"" = ""2025-09-16 12:00:00 +0200"" ]; then
    export GIT_AUTHOR_DATE=""2024-09-16 12:00:00 +0200""
    export GIT_COMMITTER_DATE=""2024-09-16 12:00:00 +0200""
elif [ ""$GIT_AUTHOR_DATE"" = ""2025-09-17 12:00:00 +0200"" ]; then
    export GIT_AUTHOR_DATE=""2024-09-17 12:00:00 +0200""
    export GIT_COMMITTER_DATE=""2024-09-17 12:00:00 +0200""
elif [ ""$GIT_AUTHOR_DATE"" = ""2025-09-18 12:00:00 +0200"" ]; then
    export GIT_AUTHOR_DATE=""2024-09-18 12:00:00 +0200""
    export GIT_COMMITTER_DATE=""2024-09-18 12:00:00 +0200""
elif [ ""$GIT_AUTHOR_DATE"" = ""2025-09-19 12:00:00 +0200"" ]; then
    export GIT_AUTHOR_DATE=""2024-09-19 12:00:00 +0200""
    export GIT_COMMITTER_DATE=""2024-09-19 12:00:00 +0200""
fi
' origin/main)
Bash(GIT_AUTHOR_DATE="2025-09-13 12:00:00" GIT_COMMITTER_DATE="2025-09-13 12:00:00" git commit -m "Add utility modules for reusable AWS configurations")
Bash(GIT_AUTHOR_DATE="2025-09-14 12:00:00" GIT_COMMITTER_DATE="2025-09-14 12:00:00" git commit -m "Add IAM lab for users, roles, and policies")
Bash(GIT_AUTHOR_DATE="2025-09-15 12:00:00" GIT_COMMITTER_DATE="2025-09-15 12:00:00" git commit -m "Add EC2 lab with instance types and security groups")
Bash(GIT_AUTHOR_DATE="2025-09-16 12:00:00" GIT_COMMITTER_DATE="2025-09-16 12:00:00" git commit -m "Add EBS lab covering volume types and snapshots")
Bash(GIT_AUTHOR_DATE="2025-09-17 12:00:00" GIT_COMMITTER_DATE="2025-09-17 12:00:00" git commit -m "Add AMI lab for image creation and lifecycle management")
Bash(GIT_AUTHOR_DATE="2025-09-18 12:00:00" GIT_COMMITTER_DATE="2025-09-18 12:00:00" git commit -m "Add EFS lab with NFS configurations and performance modes")
Bash(GIT_AUTHOR_DATE="2025-09-19 12:00:00" GIT_COMMITTER_DATE="2025-09-19 12:00:00" git commit -m "Update README with comprehensive AWS SAA study lab structure")
